attributes.action: Provide more information/research about SUDEP - unexpected death in epilepsy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I would like to see more information provided about unexpected death in epilepsy. Epilepsy is very much mis understood, even G.P's do not know enough to help in the correct manner.

This I know from first hand experience when my son, became diagnosed with epilepsy.

More research and information is needed about epilepsy as a whole.
